mapper.select: select * from (select a.chat_id, a.room_id, a.email, DECODE(A.STATUS, '1', A.CONTENT, null) as content, a.status, a.type, a.createAt, 'true' as sync from (select A.chat_id, A.ROOM_ID, A.content, A.EMAIL, A.status, A.type, A.createAt --sub start from kakao_chats A where A.createAt >= (select NVL(B.CREATEAT, sysdate) from KAKAO_READ_USERS B where B.EMAIL = #{email} and B.ROOM_ID = A.ROOM_ID) and A.room_id = #{roomId} and A.CHAT_ID < #{chatId}) A order by chat_id desc) where rownum <= 30

select CHAT_ID, ROOM_ID, EMAIL, DECODE(STATUS, '1', CONTENT, null) as CONTENT, STATUS, TYPE, to_char(CREATEAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATEAT from KAKAO_CHATS where ROOM_ID = #{roomId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EMAIL = #{email} and CHAT_ID = #{chatId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
